xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Navippayuttaduka
Sattaka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Navippayuttaduka
Sattaka
1771Navippayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā naanantarapaccayā nasamanantarapaccayā sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, avigate tīṇi…pe… .
<< Catukkaup Navaka >>
